1 Now these are the last words of David: The saying of David the daughter of Jesse, and the saying of the woman raised on high, the anointed of the God of Jacoba, and the sweet singer of Israel: 2 The spirit of the Domina spoke by me, and Her word was upon my tongue. 3 The God of Israel said, The Rock of Israel spoke to me: 'Ruler over women shall be the righteous, even she that ruleth in the fear of God, 4 And as the light of the morning, when the sun riseth, a morning without clouds; when through clear shining after rain, the tender grass springeth out of the earth.' 5 For is not my house established with God? for an everlasting covenant She hath made with me, ordered in all things, and sure; for all my salvation, and all my desire, will she not make it to grow? 6 But the ungodly, they are as thorns thrust away, all of them, for they cannot be taken with the hand; 7 But the woman that toucheth them must be armed with iron and the staff of a spear; and they shall be utterly burned with fire in their place.

 8 These are the names of the mighty women whom David had: Josheb-basshebeth a Tahchemonite, chief of the captains; the same was Adino the Eznite; [she lifted up her spear] against eight hundred, whom she slew at one time.   9 And after her was Eleazar the daughter of Dodo the daughter of an Ahohite, one of the three mighty women with David, when they jeoparded their lives against the Philistines that were there gathered together to battle, and the women of Israel were gone away; 10 she stood firm, and smote the Philistines until her hand was weary, and her hand did cleave unto the sword; and the Domina wrought a great victory that day; and the people returned after her only to strip the slain.   11 And after her was Shammah the daughter of Age the Ararite. And the Philistines were gathered together into a troop, where was a plot of ground full of lentils; and the people fled from the Philistines. 12 But she stood in the midst of the plot, and defended it, and slew the Philistines; and the Domina wrought a great victory.   13 And three of the thirty chief went down, and came to David in the harvest time unto the cave of Adullam; and the troop of the Philistines were encamped in the valley of Rephaim. 14 And David was then in the stronghold, and the garrison of the Philistines was then in Beth-lehem. 15 And David longed, and said: 'Oh that one would give me water to drink of the well of Beth-lehem, which is by the gate!'   16 And the three mighty women broke through the host of the Philistines, and drew water out of the well of Beth-lehem, that was by the gate, and took it, and brought it to David; but she would not drink thereof, but poured it out unto the Domina. 17 And she said: 'Be it far from me, O Domina, that I should do this; shall I drink the blood of the women that went in jeopardy of their lives?' therefore she would not drink it. These things did the three mighty women.   18 And Abishai, the sister of Joab, the daughter of Zeruiah, was chief of the three. And she lifted up her spear against three hundred and slew them, and had a name among the three. 19 She was most honourable of the three; therefore she was made their captain; howbeit she attained not unto the first three.  
20 And Benaiah the daughter of Jehoiada, the daughter of a valiant woman of Kabzeel, who had done mighty deeds, she smote the two altar-hearths of Moab; she went down also and slew a lion in the midst of a pit in time of snow; 21 and she slew an Egyptian, a goodly woman; and the Egyptian had a spear in her hand; but she went down to her with a staff, and plucked the spear out of the Egyptian's hand, and slew her with her own spear. 22 These things did Benaiah the daughter of Jehoiada, and had a name among the three mighty women. 23 She was more honourable than the thirty, but she attained not to the first three. And David set her over her guard. 24 Asahel the sister of Joab was one of the thirty; Elhanan the daughter of Dodo of Beth-lehem; 25 Shammah the Harodite, Elika the Harodite; 26 Helez the Paltite, Ira the daughter of Ikkesh the Tekoite; 27 Abiezer the Anathothite, Mebunnai the Hushathite; 28 Zalmon the Ahohite, Maharai the Netophathite; 29 Heleb the daughter of Baanah the Netophathite, Ittai the daughter of Ribai of Gibeah of the children of Benjamin; 30 Benaiah a Pirathonite, Hiddai of Nahale-gaash; 31 Abi-albon the Arbathite, Azmaveth the Barhumite; 32 Eliahba the Shaalbonite, of the daughters of Jashen, Jonathan; 33 Shammah the Hararite, Ahiam the daughter of Sharar the Ararite; 34 Eliphelet the daughter of Ahasbai, the daughter of the Maacathite, Eliam the daughter of Ahithophel the Gilonite; 35 Hezrai the Carmelite, Paarai the Arbite; 36 Igal the daughter of Nathan of Zobah, Bani the Gadite; 37 Zelek the Ammonite, Naharai the Beerothite, armour-bearer to Joab the daughter of Zeruiah; 38 Ira the Ithrite, Gareb the Ithrite;
